title: What does, "Danger, Will Robinson!" mean?

og.title: What does, "Danger, Will Robinson!" mean?
og.description: Answer (1 of 3): It is a instruction serves as a warning to someone who is probably about to make a mistake Ex: If you have tried with wrong attempt of login and for the third time if u did the same mistake then the system will gets automatically locks up then it shows pop-up message as “Danger, ...
